DataElement.preferredName: User Facility Importer Contact Person Email Address Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A hospital, ambulatory surgical facility, nursing home, outpatient diagnostic facility, or outpatient treatment facility which is not a physician's office._The party responsible for bringing goods into a country._A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group._A text string identifier for a location to which e-mail can be delivered._The string of characters that represents an electronic mail address. [Explanatory comment:  The format for this value domain is the SMTP standard local-part@domain]

Property.preferredDefinition: An e-mail address identifies a location to which e-mail can be delivered. A modern Internet e-mail address (using SMTP) is a string of the form jsmith@domain.example. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: A text string identifier for a location to which e-mail can be delivered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: contact information for communications over distance, including telephone and fax numbers, e-mail, and web addresses.
